main event: Mrs. Ella Parman observed two strange objects hovering over the Niagara River, described as round and reddish-orange, on September 7, 1966.
interesting points: The objects were about 20-30 feet in diameter and completely silent., The objects maneuvered around for about 10 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., Multiple sightings in the same time frame were reported, including calls to police about red lights in the sky., Witnesses included trained observers such as a detective and a meteorologist., A film recording of another sighting was evaluated but provided little additional information.
witness description: Mrs. Ella Parman and other trained observers including a detective and a meteorologist.
